definition: to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless

sentences.chinese: 艾丽森的父亲汉克也是混血儿。
但第二代混血儿就不同了。

sentences.english: Some migrated finding one another and began to interbreed .
sentences.chinese: 有些人迁移而发现另一个种族并开始混血。

sentences.english: "These Amerasians are pretty amazing, " Nancy said.
sentences.chinese: 这些美亚混血儿太不可思议了。

sentences.english: It is very significant to study on the text of Halfbreed.
sentences.chinese: 对《混血儿》的文本解读和研究是十分有意义的。

sentences.english: A year ago, a mutt helped me fulfill one of my dreams.
sentences.chinese: 一年以前，一只混血狗实现了我的一个愿望。

sentences.english: How do you tell if you have a Campbells, a Winter White or a hybrid?
sentences.chinese: 如何分别坎贝尔，冬白以及它们的混血后代。

sentences.english: That ground was broken by Vanessa-Mae, a violinist of Thai-Chinese descent.
sentences.chinese: 首开先例的是陈美，一位中泰混血的小提琴家。

sentences.english: Accidentally, my Dachshund and Basset Hound gave birth to a mongrel.
sentences.chinese: 一不留神，我家的腊肠和巴吉度生出了一个混血种。

sentences.english: There are some people do not know Hongkong is in, in fact, China…. hahaha….
sentences.chinese: 不知道有多少人晓得，我是英亚混血，现在住在香港。

sentences.english: Jews viewed Samaritans as half-breeds, both physically and spiritually.
sentences.chinese: 犹太人认为撒玛利亚人在肉体和灵魂上都是混血。

sentences.english: In other words, how would the human help the Zetas and the Hybrids?
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，人类怎样帮助齐塔人和混血人种呢？

sentences.english: Human and succubus hybrids can cast haste and slow.
sentences.chinese: 人类和女妖的混血儿可以施放加速和减速魔法。

sentences.english: For starters, my background is Taiwanese Atayal and African American .
sentences.chinese: 首先，我的背景是台湾泰雅族以及美国黑人混血。

sentences.english: A look at famous interracial families in America.
sentences.chinese: 看看美国有名的混血种族家庭。

definition: five sense organs of TCM (nose, eyes, lips, tongue, ears 鼻目口舌耳)/facial features
